turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Algés (Oeiras).
turn.2: Algés (Oeiras)  Algés () is a former civil parish in the municipality of Oeiras, in Lisbon metropolitan area, Portugal.
turn.3: When was it made into a parish?
turn.4: In 2013, the parish merged into the new parish Algés, Linda-a-Velha e Cruz Quebrada-Dafundo.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: The population in 2011 was 22,273, in an area of 1.98 km².
turn.8: The parish is located near the Tagus river, between the town of Oeiras and the capital city of Lisbon.
turn.10: It is also a part of the Greater Lisbon Area.
turn.12: It is mostly a residential suburb.
